child.name: (b) With the approval of the Director, other relevant courses may satisfy the requirements for the minor.
(r) COM LIT 100A, 107 and 150 courses must have a Middle Eastern focus to be counted toward the minor.

Four upper-division courses required for the minor must be successfully completed at UCI. Two of the four may be taken through the UC Education Abroad Program, provided course content is approved in advance by the Director.
